subNode:value.scalar:string: Adds a block with additional links.
Are you sure you want to delete all your links ?
blocklink ( `id_blocklink` int(2) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `new_window` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id_blocklink`)) ENGINE=
blocklink_shop ( `id_blocklink` int(2) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_shop` int(2) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id_blocklink`, `id_shop`)) ENGINE=
blocklink_lang ( `id_blocklink` int(2) NOT NULL, `id_lang` int(2) NOT NULL, `text` varchar(64) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id_blocklink`, `id_lang`)) ENGINE=
blocklink_shop` bs ON b.`id_blocklink` = bs.`id_blocklink` AND bs.`id_shop` IN (
You must fill in all fields
An error occurred during link creation.
An error occurred during title updating.
The block title has been updated.
An error occurred during link deletion.
An error occurred during sort order set-up.
blocklink_lang bl ON (b.id_blocklink = bl.id_blocklink) WHERE b.id_blocklink=
">
